dialogue.library_intro: Built in the Osaka Civilian Naval Yards, 3rd of the Kagerou-class Destroyers, Kuroshio. Even though I look like this, I participated in such hard-fought battles as Surabaya, the South Pacific and the third Battle of Solomon, ya' know.
dialogue.secretary3: Hey, there's nothing wrong with my body, y'know?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Chief? Chieeef? Can yoouu heeeear me? ...Oh well. Guess I'll just take it easy then.
dialogue.secretarymarried: It's no good to overwork yourself, chief. It worries us when we see it.
dialogue.wedding: I... I'm... always lookin' at the chief, y'know? Really! C'mon, believe me...
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Well then, Kuroshio, off I go!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm just gonna rest for a bit~
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Oww... I can't really bear this level of pain...
dialogue.docking_complete: The ship repair has been finished?
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted! C'mon, follow Kuroshio~!
dialogue.mvp: It just kind of happened that way, don't worry about me.
dialogue.sunk: I… I can't live any longer… Goodbye…
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, today is an anniversary right? Kuroshio is happy too!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: The rain huh. The season of rain, it is good in it's own way.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Chief? Why don't we go together to the sea? Nah, not to an expedition; to the sandy beach!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Mmm! Christmas cake is delicous! Chief, say aaanh~
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: This year is also about to end. Time to do cleaning.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, it's new yea'. I'm countin' on you this year too.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Ehōmaki, huh~ Um, which direction it is this year? This way, is it? *nom*
